|brand = ZyXEL |model = NSA325 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/16/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ZyXEL_NSA325_v2 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300, (Feroceon core); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 <!-- TE --> |cpu1_type_rev = (ARMADA 300) |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = cFeon;EN27LN1G08-25TIP; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G0846Q-BCK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 28:28:5D
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 patch 18;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA II, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, fan |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;NXP;8563T;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Controller;NEC;D720200AF1;;1;,,, 8-bit MCU with EEPROM;Holtek;HT66F30;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4459;;1;,,, 8Mbit Serial NOR Flash;Macronix;MX25L8006EM1I-12G;;1;,,, 2A 23V Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7182S;;4;,,, 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Advanced Analog Circuits;AZ1117H;;2;,,, 340kHz 2A 23V Synchronous Step-down Converter;Richtek;RT8295A;;1;,,, 340kHz 2A/3A Synchronous Step-down DC/DC;Global Mixed-mode Tech;G5795;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 0B1-00TN-00004 |asin = B00FJ2CE4O |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "45-402-000443" is silkscreened on the main board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6282 @1.6GHz (ARM v5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 128MB NAND Flash, 2x SATA II *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 *Power: 12V 5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== [http://origin-eu.zyxel.com/ProductTab.shtml?pid=20130508112312&idx=7&c=gb&l=en Specifications]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nsa325 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/nsa325 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = kirkwood |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_xscale |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = WoL supported, Marvell 88E1318 Phy }} Please insert instructions here
